title: RINGO KID - ATLAS/MARVEL WESTERN
description:
R I N G O     K I D  
ATLAS/MARVEL COMICS (1954-1976)
(Incomplete)

Another Marvel Western torrent.  All the issues I could find of Ringo Kid. Both Atlas (v1) and Marvel (v2) series are included.


From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

he Ringo Kid debuted in the anthology Wild Western #26 (Feb. 1953). His series Ringo Kid (first three issues titled Ringo Kid Western) ran 21 issues (Aug. 1954 - Sept. 1957), with his adventures drawn primarily by Joe Maneely and Fred Kida Stories ran occasionally as well in Wild Western ÃƒÂ¢?? with artist John Severin taking the reins in at least issues #46-47 (Nov. 1955 - Jan. 1956) ÃƒÂ¢?? and Ringo was the lead feature in the two-issue anthology series Western Trails (May & July 1957).

Marvel reprinted the series in Ringo Kid Vol. 2, #1-30 (Jan. 1970 - Nov. 1976), often with the original Maneely covers. The Ringo Kid made his first appearance in present-day stories in a time travel tale in the superhero-team comic The Avengers #142 (Dec. 1975)

Marvel writer Steve Englehart planned a revival series at about this time, with art by Dick Ayers: "Every series I did took off so Marvel kept giving me more. I relaunched this classic Western ÃƒÂ¢?? always my favorite of Marvel&#039;s true cowboy heroes (as opposed to the Two-Gun Kid, whom I also liked but who was more a superhero) ÃƒÂ¢?? with classic Western artist Dick Ayres [sic]. But after this first issue was drawn and scripted, Marvel decided to do more superheroes and fewer cowboys, so it was set aside before inking".
